| HistoryText             = '''Weapon XI''' was part of the [[Weapon Plus (Earth-616)|Weapon Plus]] program dedicated to the creation of super-soldiers. For long, "Weapon XI" remained a mystery.{{r|Weapon X Vol 2 23}} 

Weapon XI was revealed to be another stage of the project created by [[Romulus (Earth-616)|Romulus]].{{r|Wolverine: Origins Vol 1 33}} He used Wolverine's son [[Akihiro (Earth-616)|Daken]] and bonded his bones to [[Muramasa]] in hopes of creating a warrior that could take down [[James Howlett (Earth-616)|Logan]].{{r|Wolverine: Origins Vol 1 36}}
